A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: First of all\, it must be noted that episode 8 is a Star Wars movie. What I mean by that is none of the Star Wars movie scripts are exceptional. It is Star Wars. It’s the visuals. It’s the music. And it’s the Force. After waiting a week to see the movie and hearing the naysayers and those touting the movie as great\, I had very low expectations going in. The result was I was pleasantly surprised. There wasn’t anything earth shattering different but it was consistent with the original story and\, I thought opened the door to the next few movies to have different plot lines. I was actually glad that not one character dominated the movie. In this regard it was more like an avenger movie with many characters. I believe this helped the movie have scope and kept the Star Wars universe intact.
